Author: crazy-mcgee
Text: jfc yes. I was always too poor in college to have a meal plan (lived 2 minutes off-campus and “commuted” from my apt) and was so food insecure. Smelling the cafeteria food as I walked to class gave me such anger, and is definitely a big reason my binging has been so bad post-college... now I work at a college and damn am I tempted to go binge in the caf sometimes.
